<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Necromancer's Generosity](/Spells.aspx?ID=955)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1  undead   minion  you control
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You channel negative energy through your magical connection to your undead minion to strengthen the creature. The target regains 1d8+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell, and it gains a +2 status bonus to saves against [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) effects for the duration.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 1d8+4.
name: Necromancer's Generosity
